original_text: They went from there to Gilead. Then they went to Kadesh in the land of the Hittites. Then they went to Dan and they continued west to Sidon.
korean_text: 길르앗에 이르고 닷딤홋시 땅에 이르고 또 다냐안에 이르러서는 시돈으로 돌아

sentences.original_text: They went from there to Gilead.
in the land of the Hittites.
and they continued west to Sidon.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 서쪽으로 계속하여 시돈에 이르렀습니다.
